Name: Florimel Kurita
Details:
Born 2942.

Florimel is the daughter of Hugai Kurita, the 28th Coordinator of the Combine, who was the grandfather of the current Coordinator, Takashi Kurita. Florimel Kurita served as the Keeper of the Family Honor of the Draconis Combine up to 3018 when she stepped down from the position.
